= Getting Started =
The [http://cqrs4j.googlecode.com/files/reference-guide-0.3.pdf Reference Guide] contains the information you need to get started.

There is also a [ArchitectureOverview Architecture Overview diagram ] available.

= Bugs and Feature Requests =
If you discover any bugs, or have any feature requests, please [http://code.google.com/p/cqrs4j/issues/list let me know]. You can also report erroneous or missing documentation.

= Get involved =
If you're interested in helping make this framework, send me an email. You can reach me at `buijzex at gmailx.comx` (remove the x-es).
